sect2.title: FormatIfElseifElse-Action
sect2.para: The FormatIfElseifElse-Action formats if, else and elseif.

para.literallayout: The option spaceAfterIf specifies if there is a space after the T_IF. The option spaceAfterElseif specifies if there is a space after the T_ELSEIF. The option spaceAfterElse specifies if there is a space after the T_ELSE. The option spaceBeforeElseif specifies if there is a space before the T_ELSEIF. The option spaceBeforeElse specifies if there is a space before the T_ELSE. The option breakAfterCurlyBraceOfIf specifies if there is a break after the curly-brace behind T_IF. The option breakAfterCurlyBraceOfElse specifies if there is a break after the curly-brace behind T_ELSE. The option breakAfterCurlyBraceOfElseif specifies if there is a break after the curly-brace behind T_ELSEIF. The option breakBeforeCurlyBraceOfElse specifies if there is a break before the curly-brace behind T_ELSE. The option breakBeforeCurlyBraceOfElseif specifies if there is a break before the curly-brace behind T_ELSEIF. The option breakAfterIf specifies if there is a break after the complete if-expression. The option breakAfterElse specifies if there is a break after the complete else-expression. The option breakAfterElseif specifies if there is a break after the complete elseif-expression. The option breakBeforeElse specifies if there is a break before the T_ELSE. The option breakBeforeElseif specifies if there is a break before the T_ELSEIF. The option spaceBeforeIfExpression specifies if there is a space before the expression of the if. The option spaceAfterIfExpression specifies if there is a space after the expression of the if. The option spaceBeforeElseifExpression specifies if there is a space before the expression of the elseif. The option spaceAfterElseifExpression specifies if there is a space after the expression of the elseif.
